required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of BMS-986179 Administered in Combination With Nivolumab in Advanced Cancers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1/2a Study of BMS-986179 Administered in Combination With Nivolumab (BMS-936558) in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability, pharmacodynamics, anti-tumor activity, and pharmacokinetics of BMS-986179 when combined with nivolumab in patients with advanced cancer.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of adverse events (AE), serious adverse events (SAE), AEs leading to discontinuation, and deaths
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: BMS-986179 enzyme assays in pre- and on-treatment biopsies
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 63 days

secondary_outcome.measure: BMS-986179 immunohistochemistry (IHC) in pre- and on-treatment biopsies
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 63 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Objective response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 2 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of response (DOR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 2 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Progression free survival rate (PFSR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 2 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed serum concentration (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Time of maximum observed serum concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the serum concentration-time curve from time zero to time of the last quantifiable concentration [AUC(0-T)]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the serum concentration-time curve in 1 dosing interval [AUC(TAU)]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent terminal half-life (T-HALF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the serum concentration-time curve from time zero extrapolated to infinite time [AUC(INF)]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Effective elimination half-life (T-HALFeff)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Concentration at the end of the dosing interval (Ctau)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Trough observed serum concentration at the end of the dosing interval (Ctrough)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Total body clearance (CLT)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of distribution at steady state (Vss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Accumulation index (AI)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution of terminal phase (Vz)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Degree of fluctuation or fluctuation index (DF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of positive anti-drug antibody (ADA) to BMS-986179
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of positive anti-drug antibody (ADA) to nivolumab
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 100 days after the last dose of study drug

arm_group.description: BMS-986179 leading to combination of BMS-986179 + nivolumab, dose as specified

intervention.description: Specified dose on specified days, intravenous (IV)
Specified dose on specified days, IV

criteria.textblock:
For more information regarding Bristol-Myers Squibb Clinical Trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com
Inclusion Criteria:
- Men and women at least 18 years of age
- Advanced solid tumors
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) 0-1
- Acceptable lab testing results
- Allow biopsies
Exclusion Criteria:
- Central nervous system (CNS) tumors
- Uncontrolled or significant cardiovascular diseases
- Active or known autoimmune disease
- Organ transplant
Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria could apply

overall_contact.last_name: Recruiting sites have contact information. Please contact the sites directly. If there is no contact information, please email:

overall_contact_backup.last_name: First line of the email MUST contain NCT# and Site #.
